publisher.publisher-name: The New Testament Society of South Africa / Die Nuwe-Testamentiese Werkgemeenskap van Suid-Afrika

title-group.article-title: The historical paradigm — Its possibilities and limitations

permissions.copyright-statement: COPYRIGHT © 1984 THE NEW TESTAMENT SOCIETY OF SOUTH AFRICA (NTSSA)

abstract.p: The thesis of this essay is that historical interpretation of the New Testament is necessary to provide information for setting the parameters of valid readings of the New Testament. Such an interpretation serves the purpose of alienation between reader and text and enables the interpreter to ask critical questions about the communicability and relevance of these texts. The nature of the New Testament necessitates historical interpretation. Current historico-critical interpretation of the New Testament is discussed and evaluated with a view to possibilities and limitations in the light of current developments in literary science, history of philosophy and historiography.
